content.text: Match ends, Villarreal 3, Granada CF 0.
Second Half ends, Villarreal 3, Granada CF 0.
Corner,  Granada CF. Conceded by Chechu Dorado.
Attempt missed. Giovani dos Santos (Villarreal) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Cani following a fast break.
Offside, Granada CF. Roberto Fernández tries a through ball, but Riki is caught offside.
Foul by Brayan Angulo (Granada CF).
Manu Trigueros (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Jérémy Perbet (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Diego Buonanotte (Granada CF) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Moi Gómez (Villarreal).
Attempt missed. Cani (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Jérémy Perbet.
Substitution, Villarreal. Manu Trigueros replaces Tomás Pina.
Goal!  Villarreal 3, Granada CF 0. Tomás Pina (Villarreal) header from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cani with a cross.
Diego Buonanotte (Granada CF) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
